DOC.brief_summary: This randomized study was designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of IPu-infused liatermin (15mg/putamen/day) compared with placebo in subjects with symptomatic, levodopa-response Parkinson's disease. This study consisted of a 90-day evaluation period followed by implantation of the IPu delivery system and then a 6-month double-blind treatment period.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Liatermin (r-metHuGDNF) Administered by Bilateral Intraputaminal (IPu) Infusion to Subjects With Idiopathic Parkinson's Disease
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of bilateral, idiopathic Parkinson's disease
